about_the_game:
Instructions for the game

The game Tale of REN is a type of visual novel game. The player will learn the story through the main character named Mizu Ren Nanami, who was sent to collect the drops of heart in a different world to save the world of Ren that is about to collapse. And the player will learn many stories in the game until the end of the story that the player can choose.

Features in the game

-Gameplay system that has choices that affect the game’s story at the end

-Suitable for players who like games that create relationships between characters

-The game features comic-style graphics with clear lines

-Has about 200 background images illustrated

-Has gallery unlock system, image, music

-Has background music in almost every scene

-The game has Thai subtitles

- Have mini game

Plot summary

In the Realm of REN, all youngsters who have reached the age of 16

must be sent on a journey to find the steam of mind.

I'm Mizu Ren Nanami. . . .

As people of REN, it's time to go on a mission to conquer the hearts of people in other realms.

Then, Rostania is the place I was chosen to come here.

The boys and girls in this school are the ultimate goal that I must strive to weave the threads of relationships until I can capture the essence of the heart's water droplets. However, while carrying out the mission entrusted to me, I discovered a secret that I never knew before, which is related to events in the past.

Me...Mizu Ren Nanami…

As a REN people, it's time to go on a mission to conquer the hearts of people in other realms.

Then, the Rostania is the town where I was chosen to come here.

to the pursuit of secrets that were never known before.

......

I ask my friends to help support the purchase so that I can have money to hire translations into English and other languages ​​in the future.
